articles.title: Disney+ announces launch date and pricing for South Africa - News24
articles.description: Disney+, the streaming service from The Walt Disney Company, has confirmed launch dates for the 42 countries and 11 new territories set to launch this winter.
articles.content:
• Disney+ will launch in South Africa on 18 May 2022, a statement announced on Tuesday.
  • South African pricing has also been revealed and will cost R119.00 per month, or R1 190.00 for an… [+2440 chars]

articles.author: Fin24 reporter
articles.title: High court delays analogue TV switch-off - News24
articles.description: The high court in Pretoria ruled that South Africa’s analogue television switch-off date must be postponed from end-March to end-June – but e.tv’s lost its bid to significantly slow down the process.
articles.content:
• The high court in Pretoria has ruled that South Africa’s analogue television switch-off date must be postponed from end-March to end-June.
  • But e.tv lost its bid to slow down the proce… [+2905 chars]

articles.title: Government invests R1 billion into natural gas project in South Africa - BusinessTech
articles.description: The Central Energy Fund (CEF) will invest R1 billion into the country’s Virginia gas project as part of a renewable energy push.
articles.content:
The Central Energy Fund (CEF) will invest R1 billion into the country’s Virginia gas project as part of a renewable energy push.

articles.title: African mask sold for 4.2 mn euros in France despite protest - Guardian Nigeria
